import { Dialog, Transition } from "@headlessui/react" import { AcademicCapIcon, XMarkIcon, CheckCircleIcon, ChevronDownIcon, ChevronUpIcon, ChatBubbleOvalLeftIcon, DocumentTextIcon, } from "@heroicons/react/24/outline" import { CheckCircleIcon as CheckCircleIconSolid } from "@heroicons/react/24/solid" import Request from "../../Request" import { useState, useEffect, Fragment } from "react" import InfoCircle from "../../../svg/info-circle.svg" import OverlayTrigger from "react-bootstrap/OverlayTrigger" import TextareaAutosize from "react-textarea-autosize" const ChatModal = ({ open, setOpen, threads, setThreads, selectedThread, setSelectedThread, socket, setShowCTASubscribed, }) => { useEffect(() => { if (!open) { setTimeout(() => { setTitleText("") setTopicText("") }, 500) } }, [open]) const [titleText, setTitleText] = useState("") const [topicText, setTopicText] = useState("") const [selectedOutputType, setSelectedOutputType] = useState("introduction") const submitNewThread = () => { const threadRequest = new Request("threads/", { method: "POST", data: { title: titleText === "" ? "New chat! ðŸŽ‰" : titleText, description: "This is the new thread's description", }, }) threadRequest .then((res) => { setThreads([...threads, res.data]) setSelectedThread(res.data.id) socket.send( JSON.stringify({ prompt_type: selectedOutputType, prompt_choices: [ { choice_type: "topic", choice: topicText, }, ], websocket_type: "generation", thread_id: res.data.id, }) ) }) .catch((err) => { setShowCTASubscribed(true) }) setOpen(false) } const writtenEnoughClass = () => { return topicText.length > 50 && selectedOutputType !== "" ? " bg-delilahSecondary" : " bg-delilahSecondary/50" } const topicTooltip = () => { return (
